entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 7.
